www.imdb.com/title/tt0059742

Sound of Music 1965 Nordic + Eng

Julie Andrews, Christopher Plummer, Eleanor Parker, Richard Haydn, Peggy Wood, Charmian Carr

Musical

*************************************************************

This brand new edition of Rodgers and Hammerstein`s THE SOUND OF MUSIC
gives you the opportunity to watch the whole film or just your favourite songs, 
with or without Sing-along subtitles.

The magical, heart-warming story, which has become the most popular family film of all time, 
tells the story of a spirited young woman, Maria (Julie Andrews), 
who leaves the convent to become governess to the seven children of the autocratic 
Captain von Trapp (Christopher Plummer). 


Technical Details

Region 2
Running Time 165 minutes
Production Year 1965
Main Language English
Subtitles Nordic + English
Genre Musicals
Directed by Robert Wise

Special Features

Introduction By Julie Andrews
Commentary By Robert Wise, 
Commentary By Julie Andrews And Christopher Plummer
Sing Along
Disc 2 with bonus materiel
